column4: hi i got a question. if u install using the alternativ cd and chose a full encryption using the whole disc by using automatic partioining using the fulldisk....does that give me an encrypted swap as well?
encrypted swap heh.  do you even know what that is?
your data does not go on swap
!ot | shiny_people
!backup
!sbackup
yes what ever doesnt fit in ur memory will go in ur swap.....and when u hibernate
!cloning
and i dont want aything to be found....
yeah something like that,  but encrypted swap hum
i think it is encrypted but not sure
well the alternate CD is meant to be able to do whole  hard disk encryption, so I guess that will include the swap
but if it shows up on /dev/mapper i guess it mst be
but its encrypted with same key and thats fine...i know u can just have it randomly encryptd each time u boot
messes up the hibernate thingy so havng same key for swap works
<sebsebseb> titon:  your data does not go on swap........ hmm seb can i ask if u know what a swap is :P
hehehe thf for help though....had to be a lill smart ass back
!swap | titon
It can also be used as extra memory if you don't have enough.   of so my data do go in the swap then :D
i know i know just bugging sebsebseb
swap is mainly for people with shitty amount of RAM :D  I guess, but  I ran quite nicely with no swap on 1GB so :d
